medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Depression and anxiety worsened approximately 1 year before admission. The patient reported sad mood, low interest, low energy, hopelessness, and fear of leaving her home. Symptoms had persisted, and she had missed multiple medical and psychiatric appointments, communicating by telephone with some practitioners.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Bipolar disorder, lung cancer (stage II nonâ€“small-cell carcinoma), breast cancer (stage IIA invasive ductal carcinoma), asthma, chronic obstructive pulmonary disease, hypertension, hypercholesterolemia, insomnia, restless leg syndrome, a history of multiple hospitalizations for mania with psychotic features.
medical_history.family_history: Mother had depression and died from myocardial infarction in her 50s; father died from leukemia in his 50s; paternal grandfather died from stomach cancer in his 60s. No family history of breast cancer or lung cancer mentioned.
medical_history.social_history: Currently married, retired, receives disability assistance, lives with husband who also has mental illness. Smoked one to two packs of cigarettes daily, did not currently drink alcohol, and had used cannabis, cocaine, and hallucinogens in the distant past.
